content:
212 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  UTME SUBJECTS  SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
 ILORIN         
 JOS          
 KASU         
 KSU        
KWASU  
 LASU         
MAIDUGURI       
NASARAWA   
MAITAMA  
 NOUN         
 OOU         
SLUK  
SOSU  
SUMMIT  
 TSUJ         
 UDU         
 UMYUK        
 YOSU           
  
   a) at least two (2)'A' level passes, including IS 
plus not less than five (5) 'O' level credit 
passes or its equivalent, including English 
Language at not more than two (2) sittings.  
b) NCE merit IS and five (5)'O' level credit passes 
in other relevant subjects  including English 
Language.  
(v) OOU requires UTME requirements in addition to 
Direct Entry requirements  
(vi) SOSU and IBADAN accept NCE merit in IS and 
other Arts or Social Science subjects.  
(vii) TSUJ accepts NCE merit in Arabic and IS.  
  
UTME  
(i) AL-HIKMAH requires working knowledge of  
Arabic.  
(ii) IBADAN accepts five (5) 'O' level credit passes at 
one (1) sitting or six (6) 'O' level credit passes at 
two (2) sittings to include English Language, IS 
and any other three (3) or four (4) subjects from 
Arts or Social Sciences.  
(iii) KASU may accept Higher IS or Senior IS Results.  
(iv) KWASU requires five (5) ‘O' level credit passes to 
include English, IS and any other two (2) Arts 
subjects.  
(v) OOU requires two (2) other subjects from Arts.  
(vi) TSUJ accepts Arabic in lieu of IS.  
(vii) UMYUK requires five (5) credit passes at ‘O’ level 
including English Language, IS and three (3) other 
relevant Arts/Social Sciencesubjects with 'O' level 
credit pass in Mathematics. Accepts Higher IS or 
Senior IS results.  
  
UTME SUBJECT  
(i) IBADAN requires IS and any other two (2) subjects from 
Arts, Sciences or Social Sciences.
